messages.messageBody:
--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "secretary" <secretarytocapt3@h...> wrote:
>
> Wounds ~please~ put this file in the streamload account
>
> Bolitho's article will sound very familiar to you because this
> article is quoted all over the place and whole excerpts have
entered
> into the more general works regarding the Bakumatsu.
>
> http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/Aizu1853-1868.zip
>
> Bolitho is also a mentor to a student
> use your browser's Edit>>"find" search for "SHIMODA"
> http://www.fas.harvard.edu/~rijs/grad_students.html
> who will also focus his dissertation on AIZU
>
> secretarytocapt3
> and the answer is "yes" I almost do live in the library
> this picture was a gift to me...
> http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/SHref6.jpg
> Please don't post this image somewhere "public"
> I was asked to include that warning


Hi to everyone... As usual your member who seems to be in a constant
state of hibernation, woke up for a few moments.. LOL... Hope
everyone is having a great start in this new year.

Sec, I uploaded the file... Just in case if I ever miss a file you
need uploaded you can always IM or e-mail. ^__^

And yes... He looks dashing...

messages.subject: Harold Bolitho "Aizu, 1853-1868"
messages.msgSnippet: Wounds ~please~ put this file in the streamload account Bolitho s article will sound very familiar to you because this article is quoted all over the place and
messages.messageBody:
Wounds ~please~ put this file in the streamload account

Bolitho's article will sound very familiar to you because this
article is quoted all over the place and whole excerpts have entered
into the more general works regarding the Bakumatsu.

http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/Aizu1853-1868.zip

Bolitho is also a mentor to a student
use your browser's Edit>>"find" search for "SHIMODA"
http://www.fas.harvard.edu/~rijs/grad_students.html
who will also focus his dissertation on AIZU

secretarytocapt3
and the answer is "yes" I almost do live in the library
this picture was a gift to me...
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/SHref6.jpg
Please don't post this image somewhere "public"
I was asked to include that warning
